title: Seattle battles plastic straws to save the oceans - Al Jazeera
body: From July 2018, Seattle will ban disposable plastic straws and cutlery from restaurants and cafes, but the city has already removed more than 2.3 million plastic straws since September.
readable_content: - Al Jazeera (<2023-12-08>): The article discusses how the city of Seattle is taking steps to battle the use of plastic straws in an effort to protect ocean environments. The activist group in the city has found unique ways to encourage recycling and decrease single-use plastic straw consumption. This initiative aligns with efforts to protect the environment and reduce plastic waste.
summary:
The article discusses Seattle's efforts to battle the use of plastic straws to protect ocean environments and decrease single-use plastic consumption. This initiative aligns with environmental protection and reducing plastic waste. Overall, the sentiment is positive towards the steps taken by Seattle. 

Sentiment: 0.8
